cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 110 miles E of Cape Canaveral, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest tonight, then turning north and finally north-northeast paralleling the southeast U.S. Atlantic coast toward South and North Carolina
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast of South Carolina or southeastern North Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch north of Ponte Vedra Beach, FL to Savannah River, GA and from Surf City, NC to the NC/VA border including Albemarle & Pamlico Sounds
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Sebastian Inlet, FL to Ponte Vedra Beach, FL and north of Savannah River, GA to Surf City, NC; Storm-Surge Warning Jupiter Inlet, FL to Surf City, NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coast from central Florida northward through Georgia and the Carolinas; northwestern Bahamas
weather_observation.wind: Outer rainbands may bring occasional gusts 20–30 mph; sustained tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely (≤9 % chance).
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the Tampa Bay side; surge focus remains on the Atlantic coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Intermittent squalls with 1–2 inches possible; widespread heavy rainfall not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Increased rip-currents and short-period swells possible in the eastern Gulf, but overall port impact minimal.
